rukus.text: 97|1|niccayamaka nam inta kur'anai (mikka kanniyamulla) lailatul katr ennum or iravil (mutalavataka) irakkivaittom
97|2|(napiye!) Antak kanniyamulla iravin makimaiyai nir arivira
97|3|kanniyamulla anta iravu ayiram matankalai vita mikka melanatakum
97|4|atil vanavarkalum, jiprayilum, tankal iraivanin kattalaiyin pati (nataipera ventiya) ella kariyankalutan irankukinranar
